Module com.electra.canbusdemo
Package com.electra.canbusdemo.CANbus

Interface Driver

All Known Implementing Classes:
CANbus_Driver
public interface Driver
This Interface represent an abstraction layer that allows to send/receive bytes to/from the connected devices.
The Driver manage the interaction with the given hardware peripheral connected to the host device.

This file contains the abstraction of the driver.

Property: E-Lectra s.r.l.

  • Method Details

    • connect

      boolean connect()
      Open the connection with the given hardware peripheral
      Returns:
      a boolean: false in case of error, true otherwise

    • closeConnection

      void closeConnection()
      Close the connection with the given hardware peripheral

    • isConnected

      boolean isConnected()
      Check if the host is connected to the given hardware peripheral
      Returns:
      a boolean: false if the host is not connected, true otherwise

    • write

      Write data on the given hardware peripheral
      Parameters:
      data - the data to be written on the given peripheral

    • setPort

      Set the port where open the connection
      Parameters:
      val - the port name where the hardware peripheral is connected
